Author: Decker#3767
Content: Depends on country. I think best way is to visit any computer parts online shop well-known in your country and pick up needed computer parts according to your budget. After - install Linux on it. It's free and nothing hard (installer will guide you). Or just play with VirtualBox on your existing Windows PC, as Nabob adviced.
